name: Trapped (itch) (TwoFaceGames)
description:
This game was created as part of a contest where the goal was to create a maze. It made it to 2nd place. Trapped is already some years old and hasn't been touched since the contest ended. Accordingly the playing time is rather short.

Story:
For some reason you (whoever you are) have been locked in a dark cellar. You have only one thing in mind; your freedom! But you're not alone. You're chased by dark creatures that are out to kill you! Why? Doesn't matter. You just want to get out of there alive.

Gameplay:
• Explore the dark cellar where you are trapped and make your way back to freedom.
• Trigger mechanisms, solve numeric codes, find ammo and open hidden treasure chests.
• Fight for keys to unlock doors by striking down the undead that hold you captive.
• Defeat your foes in a tactical combat system using knives, bombs, and firearms.

Playtime:
~ 20 min.
